analysis.key_quote: Applying Schedule F would make our government workers overly subservient to partisan priorities (which is what “Presidential directives” are, regardless of party), even when they are supposed to be non-partisan.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of government workers and the loss of institutional knowledge due to partisanship, which aligns with the themes of nonpartisan governance and the protection of civil service integrity.
